column5: We are having a regular Fall season this year, some warm days and some cooler. Despite the ridiculously wet spring the grouse are numerous. I finally got out the last week to shoot a few, took a rod along too to shore fish.   my son took his Hunterâ€™s and Firearms course this spring and we got out for the first time yesterday. Heâ€™s a very good fisherman but just not really into it, he loves hunting though. Heâ€™s using a .22 I got for him for his Birthday, neither of us are used to it yet, and while we managed 5 shots at birds yesterday we alas ended up birdless, but he loved it and is pumped to go again.   Canâ€™t wait for him to get his first bird!
